document.full_text: for babies at higher risk of childhood diabetes because of family history or genes, a gluten-free diet in the first year of life does not lower the chances of developing the disease, german researchers report.
document.title: gluten not linked to babies' risk of diabetes: study
lines_and_colors: for babies at higher risk of childhood diabetes because of family history or genes, a gluten-free diet in the first year of life does not lower the chances of developing the disease, german researchers report.
